51

149 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const Alerts::AlertState& state) {
150  switch (state) {
151  case Alerts::AlertState::READY:
152  stream << "READY";
153  break;
154  case Alerts::AlertState::STARTED:
155  stream << "STARTED";
156  break;
157  case Alerts::AlertState::STOPPED:
158  stream << "STOPPED";
159  break;
160  case Alerts::AlertState::SNOOZED:
161  stream << "SNOOZED";
162  break;
163  case Alerts::AlertState::COMPLETED:
164  stream << "COMPLETED";
165  break;
166  case Alerts::AlertState::PAST_DUE:
167  stream << "PAST_DUE";
168  break;
169  case Alerts::AlertState::FOCUS_ENTERED_FOREGROUND:
170  stream << "FOCUS_ENTERED_FOREGROUND";
171  break;
172  case Alerts::AlertState::FOCUS_ENTERED_BACKGROUND:
173  stream << "FOCUS_ENTERED_BACKGROUND";
174  break;
175  case Alerts::AlertState::ERROR:
176  stream << "ERROR";
177  break;
178  }
179  return stream;
180 }
